content: When I attempt to move by Mbox folder (31,000 emails) from "Local Folders" to my Gmail inbox, it stops mid-stream at 1,600 emails. Any idea why? And any fixes? Thanks!
creator: kec508

title: Threading!  (Yes again!)
content:
I want to add my voice to the myriad complaints that have already been posted about the way Thunderbird has started threading messages!

I loathe threading!

Like many others, I do not understand why there is not a simple menu option, or something in the settings, that lets me turn OFF threading, permanently, in every folder of every account.

There are so many complaints about this that I just had to stop reading them after half an hour. I agree with most of them, so I won't reiterate every single point. I couldn't see any poster defending threading, and I couldn't see anything from a developer explaining why this is forced on users. Is it simply a matter of the developers themselves liking it, and not caring what the user base thinks? I respect the developers. I respect Linus Torvalds too, but I don't hesitate to call him out when he says something really dumb, which he does depressingly often. Being a developer gives you the right to control a product, but it does not make you right.

I am a monthly financial contributor to Thunderbird. I have used it for many years. But this is a deal-breaker for me. If a solution to this problem isn't forthcoming, *soon*, I will abandon ship. The withdrawal of my small monthly financial support won't hurt the team. I only mention it to establish that I have been a committed Thunderbird user who demonstrates that commitment in practical terms.
creator: mozilla411

title: Thunderbird profile is not updating
content:
I have thunderbird 128.1.1 load on my computer. Every time it loads it asks for the pop.gmail password. I just had to change all my gmail passwords for fraud protection.

Thunderbird will not accept the new passwords, keeps returning to the the same screen. Recognized that password from google had been changed, but won't accept any passwords from google

Not running firewall, VPN or antivirus program.

Even when I had to change signature information in accounts, it does not keep the data like I was never there. I had 1 gmail account I added and next time I opened thunderbird it was not there.

Operating system info

Device name Toms-Powerhouse Processor 11th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-11700 @ 2.50GHz 2.50 GHz Installed RAM 32.0 GB (31.6 GB usable) Device ID F5A93EC4-DA36-49B4-8B6C-F4A129C56DD5 Product ID 00355-60680-71620-AAOEM System type 64-bit operating system, x64-based processor Pen and touch No pen or touch input is available for this display

Edition Windows 11 Pro Version 23H2 Installed on ‎9/‎29/‎2022 OS build 22631.4112 Experience Windows Feature Experience Pack 1000.22700.1034.0
creator: trjunkstuffid

title: Thunderbird Email v115.11.0 broke Multi-Instance Sessions (ie more than one version running)
content:
Thunderbird Portable v115.9.0 may be the last working version that allowed multiple sessions and versions to run at the same time. I tested it and it worked.

Thunderbird Email v115.11.0 is definitely broke for Multi-Instance Sessions. I tested it and it does not work.

So perhaps somewhere between v115.10.0 and v115.10.2 Multi-Instance functionality was broken on the portable version of the Thunderbird Email App.
creator: coderios_2015_dev
